full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Desk Clamp Outlets**
==============================================

**Tender Reference:** cb-234-808059
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 20232150-IRB
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-18
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-12T14:00:00 (Expired)

The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada, Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada, 344 Slater Street, 12th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K1, Canada, is inviting bids for the acquisition of Desk Clamp Outlets.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* The Department of the Immigration and Refugee Board requires the following items:
	+ 490 PODs with 2 Power outlets, 2 USB ports (1 USB A – 1 USB C), white, 10' 3'' 1/2D x 6''W x 7''H, or equivalent
	+ Requested delivery date: March 31, 2024
* Bid tenderers must already hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* Name: Kris Rickett
* Email address: <kris.rickett@irb-cisr.gc.ca>
* Phone: (343) 541-7157
* Province: Ontario

**Bid Documents**
----------------

The bid document can be obtained from the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27820/20232150-irb-english.pdf) in English or [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27820/20232150-irb-french.pdf) in French.

Note: This tender announcement is expired. Suppliers are advised to verify the tender status before submitting any bid.
